body_html:
@ebrevdo - Hi , is this a Issue in the following code , I am not able to find out , what i am doing wrong with this following snippet

 import tensorflow as tf
 from tensorflow.python.ops import tensor_array_ops
 import numpy as np

def body(time_var, attention_tracker):
    a = tf.random_uniform(shape=[2, 2], dtype=tf.int32, maxval=100)
    b = tf.constant(np.array([[1, 2], [3, 4]]), dtype=tf.int32)
    c = a + b
    attention_tracker.write(time_var, c)
    return time_var+1 ,  attention_tracker

def condition(time_var, attention_tracker):
    return time_var < 10

 x = tf.Variable(tf.constant(0, shape=[2, 2]))
 attention_tracker = tensor_array_ops.TensorArray(tf.float32, size=1, dynamic_size=True,     infer_shape=False)

 time = tf.constant(0)
 time_new , attention_tracker_result = tf.while_loop(condition, body, [time, attention_tracker])

 with tf.Session():
     tf.initialize_all_variables().run()
     print(attention_tracker_result.pack().eval())

The error is InvalidArgumentError: TensorArray TensorArray: Could not read from TensorArray index 0 because it has not yet been written to.
body_text:
@ebrevdo - Hi , is this a Issue in the following code , I am not able to find out , what i am doing wrong with this following snippet
 import tensorflow as tf
 from tensorflow.python.ops import tensor_array_ops
 import numpy as np

def body(time_var, attention_tracker):
    a = tf.random_uniform(shape=[2, 2], dtype=tf.int32, maxval=100)
    b = tf.constant(np.array([[1, 2], [3, 4]]), dtype=tf.int32)
    c = a + b
    attention_tracker.write(time_var, c)
    return time_var+1 ,  attention_tracker

def condition(time_var, attention_tracker):
    return time_var < 10

 x = tf.Variable(tf.constant(0, shape=[2, 2]))
 attention_tracker = tensor_array_ops.TensorArray(tf.float32, size=1, dynamic_size=True,     infer_shape=False)

 time = tf.constant(0)
 time_new , attention_tracker_result = tf.while_loop(condition, body, [time, attention_tracker])

 with tf.Session():
     tf.initialize_all_variables().run()
     print(attention_tracker_result.pack().eval())

The error is InvalidArgumentError: TensorArray TensorArray: Could not read from TensorArray index 0 because it has not yet been written to.
body:
@ebrevdo - Hi , is this a Issue in the following code , I am not able to find out , what i am doing wrong with this following snippet

```
 import tensorflow as tf
 from tensorflow.python.ops import tensor_array_ops
 import numpy as np

def body(time_var, attention_tracker):
    a = tf.random_uniform(shape=[2, 2], dtype=tf.int32, maxval=100)
    b = tf.constant(np.array([[1, 2], [3, 4]]), dtype=tf.int32)
    c = a + b
    attention_tracker.write(time_var, c)
    return time_var+1 ,  attention_tracker

def condition(time_var, attention_tracker):
    return time_var < 10

 x = tf.Variable(tf.constant(0, shape=[2, 2]))
 attention_tracker = tensor_array_ops.TensorArray(tf.float32, size=1, dynamic_size=True,     infer_shape=False)

 time = tf.constant(0)
 time_new , attention_tracker_result = tf.while_loop(condition, body, [time, attention_tracker])

 with tf.Session():
     tf.initialize_all_variables().run()
     print(attention_tracker_result.pack().eval())
```

The error is InvalidArgumentError: TensorArray TensorArray: Could not read from TensorArray index 0 because it has not yet been written to.
